channel.title: Need help with compile
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/307t15d.jpg[/img] @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause
how can I make that work for my client it has the right java path. its my source one
it is also a delta source

item.title: Need help with compile
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Try

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; src/*.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with compile
item.dc:creator: @Creede Creede
item.description:
@Creede wrote:

I said java wasn’t the problem my jdk is 26

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with compile
item.dc:creator: @Waterdude Waterdude
item.description:
@Waterdude wrote:

Heres what you do, you go to “my computer” > C: > Program Files > Java > Now look at folder Jdk says. If its a 1.6.0_25 or whatever. Then go to your compiler, left click and select Edit. Change the jdk1.6.0_26 to the version you saw on your jdk.

That was assuming you have jdk.

IF that doesnt work, go to Common Compiling errors made by DeathChaos at the top of this forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with compile
item.dc:creator: @Creede Creede
item.description:
@Creede wrote:


@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe” -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java
pause

how can I make that work for my client it has the right java path. its my source one

it is also a delta source

Read full topic
